english_example_sentence: This loyal waiter always serves well in the restaurant.
russian_example_sentence: Этот верный официант всегда хорошо обслуживает в ресторане.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu sadık garson, restoranda her zaman iyi hizmet eder.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu sadık garson, restoranda her zaman iyi ______.
